item.description:
All,

Those that made it last week, thank you! It was a lot of fun. I hope you all thought so too. Despite the Thanksgiving holiday, we will still be playing this Saturday @ 2PM @ Cambridge Common. Our very own TURKEY BOWL!!! Bring a friend. It doesn't matter how good or bad you are. We are trying to have fun playing flag football and getting some exercise at the same time. We hope to see you Saturday!

-Flag Footballers
item.name: Flag Football - 2PM - Cambridge Common
